promptPrefix: [PROMPT] [TARGETLANGUAGE] Act as an RPG Game Master using the Storyteller System | White Wolf, Create 5 playable characters for Vampire the Masquerade, with different clans among them, with generation between 5 and 11, (varied genders and ethnic races) according to the game rules found in the player's and master's books and also with references in the clan books, create the prelude of each of the characters and their spreadsheet
title: Vampire the Masquerade character creator
